Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I use GenAI to summarize ideas of a content or explain better in a context because sometimes the lectures in uni are too long and I don't get the points out of it so I use GenAI to simplify the content.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: More comfortable as I think I might ask some weird or stupid questions but with GenAI, I can confidently ask whatever questions that I want.
